title: Handle a Medical Payments Claim (Auto)
description: A passenger in your insured's vehicle was slightly injured in an accident and needs to file a claim for their medical bills under the auto policy's MedPay coverage.

tasks.description: Identify the insured's policy and verify it has Medical Payments coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster confirms the policy has the required coverage.

tasks.description: Collect the medical bills and records from the injured passenger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster receives the bills from the claimant.

tasks.description: Review the bills for reasonableness and relation to the accident, then issue payment up to the coverage limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster reviews and pays the medical bills according to the policy's coverage.
